title: ISS-3631: Restructure HOA Tables + Edit button for PM and HOA Handling
body:
# Description

1. Rename Special Handling:
    - Changed 'PM Special Handling' to 'HOA Special Handling' for self-managed HOAs in the HOA tab.
    - This update applies to all HOAs.
2. Add Edit Button and Submit Button:
    - Introduced an edit button on the right side of both the HOA Special Handling and PM Special Handling panels within the all-related HOA table.
    - The edit button allows users to expand a text box for entering special handling instructions specific to each HOA or PM.
    - Included a Submit button within the expanded text box.
    - Users can enter special handling information and save it by clicking the Submit button, which updates the specific HOA or PM special handling panel.

3. Remove Ready to Order Button:
    - Removed the "Ready to order" button and associated validation, as they are no longer required for the current functionality.
    - Identified and eliminated all validations related to the "Ready to order" button.
   
4. Placeholders:
    - Added placeholders in the text boxes to guide users on how to write special handling instructions

## Link to Issue Tracker

title: ISS-2649: Adding Validations/Checkpoints to the Order Processing Process (Basic Version)
body:
# Description

1. Added Order Acknowledgement Pop-up:
    - Displays client comments, documents ordered by the client, uploaded files, and client-specific requirements or special handling.
    - Each section includes a checkbox that must be checked.
    - Users must click the 'Accept' button after checking all boxes to acknowledge before proceeding to the finder 
    checklist.
    - Implemented validation to prevent progression without checking all boxes and accepting the pop-up.

2.  Mode of Order Selection:
    - When changing the order status to "PO ordered" or "PO received" in the Documents Section → Documents & Services 
    Status → Documents Requested by Client for HOA Documents.
    - Added validation to ensure the "Mode of Order" is selected.
    - Displays an error message "Please select Mode of Order" if the mode is not selected during the status change.

3. Validated ETA for PO Analysis Completion:

    - For order-type HOA Documents, prevented PO/FPO analysts from marking PO Analysis as complete if documents are 
    ordered but ETA is not provided.
    - Displays an error message "Please fill in the ETA" for self-managed HOAs when ETA is missing.

3. Validated Cost for PO Analysis Completion:
    - For order-type HOA Documents, prevented PO/FPO analysts from marking PO Analysis as complete if documents are 
    ordered but Cost is not provided.
    - Allows a cost value of "0" if the cost is due at closing.
    - Displays an error message "Please fill in the Cost" when Cost is missing and not set to "0".

## Link to Issue Tracker
[:ticket: ISS-2649](https://app.devrev.ai/inspecthoa/works/ISS-2649)

title: Iss 3393 add insurance checklist
body:
# Description

- The lender review team currently uses a manual Excel-based checklist to review insurance requirements, which is inefficient and lacks visibility for team leads and new team members. To streamline this process and improve clarity, we need to integrate this checklist digitally within the "Insurance and Hazard" section under "Lender Review."

- This checklist should be specific to the type of project review requested (Limited Project Review or Full Project Review), and the correct checklist should be displayed based on the documents/services requested by the client. These requests can be seen under the Document Section -> Documents & Services status. If both Limited and Full Project Reviews are requested, only the Full Project Review checklist should be shown.

title: ISS-3309-Accept-order-button-for-FPOs
body:
# Description

Created an accept order button
Button is visible when
- HOA Documents order
- `Finder` and `Caller` status is `NONE`, PO should be assigned and status to be `PO NEW`
- Visible to PO User
- Trial Status should be No

Once Button is clicked, PO status will be set to `IN PROGRESS`, if Finder and Caller analyst are set, There progress is set to `IN PROGRESS`
If `Finder` and `caller` analyst are not set while clicking `Accept Order` Button, Finder and Caller status will be set to `IN PROGRESS` if `finder`, `caller`, `PO` are same user

title: ISS-3385: Confirmation numbers and screen shot upload revamp
body:
# Description

1. Confirmation Number Auto-Population:
    - Automatically populate the confirmation number when a master, sub, or third HOA is assigned.
    - Ensure the confirmation number is not linked to the documents grid.
2.  Multiple Confirmation Numbers for HOA:
    -Add the ability to enter multiple confirmation numbers for the same HOA.
3. HOA Documents SS Upload:
    - Introduce a screenshot (SS) upload section for HOA document orders directly in front of the confirmation number row.
4. Non-HOA Orders SS Upload:
    - Move the SS upload section for non-HOA orders (e.g., Lien Search, Mortgage Payoffs) from the bottom of the page to the top.
5. PO SS Approval Status:
    - Implement a new approval status indicator for PO SS based on the provided design.
6. Save confirmation number files for each entry 
7. Introduce confirmation number index to display and order confirmation numbers
